content.question: <math alttext="the integral from, 0 to infinity, of, the fraction with numerator x, and denominator open parenthesis, 1 plus x squared, close parenthesis, squared, end fraction, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is
